Name: Grand Father ISLAND
About the game: EGEA Game presents GRAND FATHER ISLAND with particular attention to artistic direction and emotional storytelling. An adventure in the heart of the mountains, a journey that addresses the protection of nature and the relationship of man with, the relationships of couples, the principles of our daily life and why we are here ... A tribute to love and peace in a poetic tale on a magical island to pay a final tribute to a loved one. Wait no longer, an extraordinary journey awaits you! for fans of atmospheric walking simulator such as shelter, journey, What Remains of Edith Finch etc Functionality: A story full of poetry. Varied environment. different puzzles A graphic style with the grain of a 16:9 camera approaching the animation film. a large map without loading. A touch of platform. A relaxing Adventure.
